resources.string: Someone you know wants you to try the Android app Droid Notify!

I\'ve been using this awesome Android application called Droid Notify. It displays a popup dialog on my screen when I receive certain notifications.\n\nYou can download this app on most Android app stores, just search for the keywords \'Droid Notify\'.
This feature is only available in the pro version. If you would like to upgrade now and purchase the pro version please click on the button below.
This feature is only available in the pro version. Please upgrade the app to access this feature.
Upgrade to Droid Notify Pro. Unlock the full potential of this application.

Please consider upgrading to the pro version of this app. If you would like to upgrade now and purchase the pro version please click on the button below.

Your support helps make the continued development and addition of new features possible.

Thank You!
The Android Messaging application could not be started.
The Android Phone application could not be started.
The Android Call Log application could not be started.
The Android Calendar application could not be started.
The Android Email application could not be started.
The Android Contacts application could not be started.
The Quick Reply application could not be started.
The Web application could not be started.
The selected message could not be found.
The phone number does not appear to be valid. Dialing number failed.
The messaging address does not appear to be valid. Reply to message failed.
The selected contact could not be found.
The selected calendar event could not be found.
Error querying the contacts available phone numbers.
Error querying the contacts available email addresses.
No phone number could be found for this contact.
No calendars could be found on your phone.
The email address does not appear to be valid. Reply to email failed.
The email application could not be started.
The Text-To-Speech service could not be started.
The Quiet Time preference could not be started.
The Twitter application could not be started.
The Twitter application could not be found. Try selecting a different preferred Twitter client.
The Facebook application could not be started.
The Facebook application could not be found. Try selecting a different preferred Facebook client.
The quick reply address does not appear to be valid. Quick Reply launch failed.
The Twitter Direct Message could not be sent.
The Tweet/Status Update could not be sent.
The application cannot gain online access at this time. Please try again later.
The URL link could not be found.
The web browser application could not be started.
The blacklist item could not be added.
Disable the context menu that is attached to notification headers.
Disable the quick contact menu that is attached to notification photos.
Select horizontal location of the window.
Select the window width padding amount.
We cannot find the required K-9 email client installed on this device. Please download a compatible K-9 email client. Click on one of the buttons below to download a compatible client.
We cannot find the required K-9 email client installed on this device. Please download a compatible K-9 email client.
When in debug mode the application will log diagnostic information.
This will delete the message from the phone.
The entire thread will be deleted from the phone.
This will delete the email from the phone.
This will delete the direct message from your Twitter account.
This will delete the notification from your Facebook account.
This will delete the message from your Facebook account.
Display the reschedule button in the header.
Define when to reschedule a notification.
Define the number of reminders to send.
Define what interval to send reminders.
Stop notifications during certain time periods.
Define when the Quiet Time will be observed.
Define the Quiet Time time period.
Select the time you would like the quiet period to start and stop.
The quiet time period is now set.
Please enter a number to send the message to.
Please enter an address to send the message to.
Please enter a message to send.
The background of the screen will blur when the quick reply window is shown.
The background of the screen will not blur when the quick reply window is shown.
The background of the screen will dim when the quick reply window is shown.
The background of the screen will not dim when the quick reply window is shown.
A draft of the message will be saved if the message is not sent.
A draft of the message will not be saved.
Select your service provider from this list. If you can\'t find it you won\'t be able to send SMS messages to Email address\'s with the built in Quick Reply.
This will add the sender to the blacklist database.
Select the font size of the button text.
Set the button text to bold.
Select the phone number format used to display phone numbers.
Display only the first 10 digits of a phone number. If there are more than 10 digits, a "0" will be placed in front of the number.
Screen will turn on when a notification is shown.
Screen will not turn on when notification is shown.
Screen will dim when it turns on (saves battery power).
Screen will not dim when it turns on.
The background of the screen will blur when a notification is shown.
The background of the screen will not blur when a notification is shown.
The background of the screen will dim when a notification is shown.
The background of the screen will not dim when a notification is shown.
Define how dim you want the background screen to get. (0 = no dimming, 100 = black)
The screens will rotate to landscape mode when the phone is rotated.
The screens will not rotate to landscape mode when the phone is rotated.
Define how long to wait before releasing the phones screen after a notification is shown. The smaller the timeout, the less battery power is used.
Phone will unlock when a notification is shown.
Phone will not unlock when a notification is shown.
Select the theme for the notifications.
Using a swiping motion, select the desired theme from the available examples below. When you find the theme you would like press the OK button to save the theme.
The notification type icon is the icon to thr right of the contact photo.
Select the font size of the notification type information text.
Show a contact photo for certain notifications.
Display the contact name in the notification header.
Hide the contact name if it is unknown.
Select the font size of the contact name text.
Display the contact number in the notification header.
Select the font size of the contact number text.
Display the contact number if the contact is unknown.
Select the placeholder image you would like to display for unknown contacts.
Select the background image you would like to display behind the contact photo.
Center align the text of the notification body text.
Select the font size you want to use when when displaying the notification body.
Display the notification body in the popup.
Do not display the notification body in the popup.
Select the maximum lines that will display in the notification body.
Load all unread sms messages when a new sms message arrives.
Define how long to wait after a SMS is received before querying the SMS inbox for a new message.
Select how the application retrieves incoming SMS messages.
Some phones/locations may display incorrect timestamps. Use this setting to adjust the displayed timestamp for SMS messages.
Check this optoin if the incoming SMS message timestamp is in UTC. (This may fix incorrect message times in the notifications)
Load all unread mms messages when a new mms message arrives.
Define how long to wait after a MMS is received before querying the MMS inbox for a new message.
Define what calls to load when a missed call is received.
Define how long to wait after a call before querying the call log for a missed call.
How often you want to read the calendar events?
Select the Calendars that you wish to be notified about.
Display the name of the Calendar that the event belongs to. (Useful if you have more than one Calendar)
How early do you want to be reminded about an upcoming event?
How early do you want to be reminded about an upcoming All-Day event?
For All-Day events, when do you want to be reminded of the event?
Send reminder notifications before the event occurs.
Define how long to wait after an email is received before querying the inbox for the new email.
Include the email account name in the notification body.

The next screen will open a Twitter web page in a web browser. This web page will ask you to allow this application to have access to your Twitter account. If you wish to proceed please click on the \"Continue\" button below.
We were not able to authenticate or access your Twitter account at this time. Please try again later.
How often you want to read your Twitter account?
The Twitter authentication data has been cleared.
%s (@%s) has requested to follow you on Twitter!
Manually read Twitter account and display notifications.
Your Twitter account has been read and notifications created.
We were not able to authenticate or access your Facebook account at this time. Please try again later.
The Facebook authentication data has been cleared.
How often you want to read your Facebook account?
You have a new Facebook Friend Request from
Manually read Facebook account and display notifications.
Your Facebook account has been read and notifications created.

The next screen will open a LinkedIn web page in a web browser. This web page will ask you to allow this application to have access to your LinkedIn account. If you wish to proceed please click on the \"Continue\" button below.
We were not able to authenticate or access your LinkedIn account at this time. Please try again later.
The LinkedIn authentication data has been cleared.
Display notifications in the status bar.
Select the notification icon you want displayed in the status bar.
Select the sound that will play when a notification is displayed.
Select the vibrate setting for notifications.
The custom led color is now set.
Play sound when you are in a phone call.
Vibrate when you are in a phone call.
Do not display private information in the status bar notifications.
Vibrate when pressing soft keys and on certain UI interactions.
Close the application when it is pushed to the background.
Ignore linked apps when closing the application.
Only display the popup window when the keyguard is engaged.
Export this applications preferences to your SD card.
The application preferences have been exported.

The application preferences were not exported. Possible causes for this error include a missing SD Card or other SD card related issues which prevents this application from writing a file to the SD card location.
Import application preferences from the SD card.\nThe preference screens will reload once the import has completed.
The application preferences have been imported.

The application preferences were not imported. Possible causes for this error include a missing preferences file, a missing SD Card or other SD card related issues which prevents this application from reading a file from the SD card location.

Droid Notify Version: %s
Device Model: %s
Firmware Version: %s
Build Number: %s
Send the debug logs to the developer.

If you like this application, please rate it and leave a comment.

Feel free to email comments, suggestions or bugs.

French Translation: Franky
Hebrew Translation: Benjo26
Polish Translation: Draco (draco.pl@gmail.com)
Portuguese Translation: Marcio Andrade (marcioaribeiro@hotmail.com.br)
Spanish Translation: Shaymelmed (shaben_translations@hotmail.com)
Simplified Chinese Translation: Jason (hrmqs86@gmail.com)
Display a confirmation dialog box when you delete an item.
Your calendar events have been read and alarms refreshed.
Ignore Flash SMS Messages AKA Class 0 Messages
Define what happens when you reply to an item.
Define what happens when you delete an item.
Define what happens when you dismiss an item.
Define what happens when you click on the notification count text.
The notifications will not display the header text (e.g. 1/1) when a single message is displayed.
The notifications will display the header text (e.g. 1/1) when a single message is displayed.
Define what to do when a notification comes in while a blocking app is running.
Status Bar Notifications will be removed when the popup notifications are removed from the screen.
Status Bar Notifications will not be removed when the popup notifications are removed from the screen.
Display Status Bar Notifications even if the popup is blocked (example, when in a phone call, messaging app, etc.).

Enter the custom vibrate pattern using the following format:
Milliseconds Off, Milliseconds On, etc.

Example:
0,1000
0,500,200,500,200,500
The custom vibrate pattern is now set.
The custom vibrate pattern entered is invalid.
Enter the time in milliseconds to turn the LED on and off.
The custom led blink pattern is now set.
The custom led blink pattern is invalid.
Display the text-to-speech (TTS) button in the header.
Choose the client that you prefer to use. This client will be used by the application when appropriate.
Droid Notify Plus offers the ability to display any app\'s notifications as a popup window on your phone. Download this add-on to unlock the full potential of your phone.
